company_info.Company Description: Talent Corner is a Recruitment Company Head Quartered In Mumbai, incorporated in the year of 2002.We have partnered with various set of clients across the industry to fulfill the vacancies of their organization.
company_info.Company Name: Talent Corner HR Services Pvt Ltd Hiring For Our Client - A Travel company

api_data.company_name: Talent Corner HR Services Pvt Ltd Hiring For Our Client - A Travel company

jd_information.description: Gather complete information about various product/services of the company.*identify market potential for the product/services of the Company*Candidate will be responsible to identify & give presentation to existing and new customers.*Revenue Generation and Achieve the Target*Excellent Communication & Presentation Skills with pleasing personality.*The ability to speak with confidence about a range of products/services*Provide accurate, complete and comprehensive responses to bid and sales leads.*Cold calling - perform any sales, prospect and appointment calls to help generate leads.*Preparing estimates and quotations for customers.*Develop the new clients.*Build the relationship with the global companies. *Improve the service level with your experience.   Requirements: > Excellent written and spoken English> Creative, hard-working with the ability to take the initiative to deliver results.> Preferred industry background: Travel Sales, Corporate Sales. > Exposure to B2B, Institutional/corporate sales. Characteristics person: > Communication skills > Open mindset  > Commercial skills > Negotiation skills Apply on tina.shah@talentcorner.in with current and expected CTC and Notice Period immediately.
